Title: Authorizes cities and towns, except a city with a population of one million or more, to establish community preservation funds
Summary: Authorizes cities and towns, except a city with a population of one million or more, to establish community preservation funds; authorizes such cities and towns to impose a real estate transfer tax with revenues to be deposited in such funds; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add §6-w, Gen Muni L; add Art 33-C §§1575 - 1588, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing cities and towns, except a city with a population of one million or more, to establish community preservation funds; and to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing cities and towns, except a city with a population of one million or more, to impose a real estate transfer tax with revenues therefrom to be deposited in such funds
